titles.title: I Will Serve No Foreign God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I lift my hands
To the coming king
To the great I am
To you I sing
For you're the one
Who reigns within my heart

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
And I will serve no foreign God
Or any other treasure
You are my hearts desire
Spirit without measure
Unto your name
I will raise, my sacrifice
